meanings.definition: A small room or building designed to provide dry heat for bathing or relaxation.
meanings.sent1: After a workout, I like to unwind in the saunas at the gym.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy sitting in saunas to relax and sweat out toxins.
meanings.sent3: Why did the steam room break up with the sauna? It couldn't handle the heat!
meanings.sent4: The sauna was a cozy cocoon of warmth, embracing me like a hug.
meanings.sent5: The sauna enveloped me in a comforting blanket of heat, melting away my stress.

meanings.definition: The act of using a sauna for health or relaxation purposes.
meanings.sent1: My weekly routine includes a session of saunas to rejuvenate my body.
meanings.sent2: She felt refreshed and invigorated after her visit to the saunas.
meanings.sent3: Why did the sauna go to therapy? It needed to work through its steam issues!
meanings.sent4: The experience of the sauna was like a healing balm for her tired muscles.
meanings.sent5: The sauna session was a soothing ritual that helped her unwind and destress.
